title: Why Trump Still Believes (Wrongly) That Ukraine Hacked the D.N.C.
description:
In the phone call at the center of the impeachment inquiry, President Trump asked Ukraine for two different investigations. Today, we explore the unexpected story behind one of them. Guest: Scott Shane, a national security reporter in the Washington bureau of The New York Times. For more information on today’s episode, visit nytimes.com/thedaily.

Background reading:

  • How a fringe theory about Ukraine took root in the White House.
  • Moscow has run a yearslong operation attempting to essentially frame Ukraine for its own 2016 election interference, according to United States intelligence agencies.
author: thedaily@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
